rules: Rule1: If Control Center dispatches the repair team, then Control Center alerts a maintenance alert.
Rule2: In case Control Center alerts a maintenance alert, Repair Team requires a diagnostic tool.
Rule3: On the condition that Manager approves a protocol change, Supervisor AI overrides manual control.

Rule4: If Manager rejects a protocol change, then, provided that Supervisor AI analyzes sensor data, then, if Supervisor AI monitors system health, then, if it is not the case that whenever Factory Unit runs energy-efficiently it processes algae biomass, Factory Unit triggers a safety shutdown.

Rule5: In case Consultant recommends process optimization, then, if it is not the case that either Manager approves a protocol change or Manager rejects a protocol change, Manager does not initiate an audit process.
Rule6: Consultant recommends process optimization, or Consultant suggests staff training.

Rule7: Under the condition that Consultant suggests staff training, then, if it is not the case that either Manager approves a protocol change or Manager rejects a protocol change, Manager does not initiate an audit process.
Rule8: Provided that Factory Unit processes algae biomass, it produces nutritious food.
Rule9: When Factory Unit operates as solar-powered, Factory Unit runs energy-efficiently.
Rule10: If it is not the case that provided that Project Alpha uses bioplastic, Factory Unit produces nutritious food, then Project Alpha fails the grant review.
Rule11: In case it is not the case that if Project Alpha uses bioplastic then Factory Unit produces nutritious food, Project Alpha passes the grant review.
Rule12: If it is not the case that either Manager approves a protocol change or Manager rejects a protocol change, Manager initiates an audit process.
Rule13: If it is not the case that if Project Alpha passes the grant review then Project Alpha does not fail the grant review, Project Alpha secures venture funding.

Rule14: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that whenever Factory Unit runs energy-efficiently it processes algae biomass then Factory Unit triggers a safety shutdown, Control Center dispatches the repair team.

Rule15: In case it is not the case that if it is not the case that whenever Factory Unit runs energy-efficiently it processes algae biomass then Factory Unit triggers a safety shutdown, Repair Team does not require a diagnostic tool.

Rule16: If it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if Project Alpha passes the grant review then Project Alpha does not fail the grant review, Project Alpha does not secure venture funding, Project Alpha develops prototype V2.

Rule17: In case it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that whenever Project Alpha passes the grant review then Project Alpha does not fail the grant review then Project Alpha does not secure venture funding then Project Alpha does not develop prototype V2, Project Alpha launches a commercial product, then Project Alpha does not launch a commercial product.

Rule18: If it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that whenever Project Alpha passes the grant review then Project Alpha does not fail the grant review then Project Alpha does not secure venture funding then Project Alpha does not develop prototype V2 then Project Alpha launches a commercial product, Project Alpha receives an industry award.

Rule19: Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that whenever Project Alpha passes the grant review then Project Alpha does not fail the grant review then Project Alpha does not secure venture funding then Project Alpha does not develop prototype V2 then Project Alpha launches a commercial product, Project Alpha does not receive an industry award.
facts: Fact2: Supervisor AI monitors system health.
Fact3: Supervisor AI analyzes sensor data.
Fact4: Factory Unit operates as solar-powered.
Fact5: It is not the case that Factory Unit triggers a safety shutdown.
Fact6: It is not the case that Supervisor AI overrides manual control.
